The context on the behind the scenes makes that even more hilarious:

"Ok, here's a guy, who's really an old man that comes from an alternate dimension made out of computer data, filled with sentient creatures that bond with kids to save both worlds, and he's dressed as Santa Claus in Australia."

And they get pay to write that stuff. Best.Job. Ever.
